src_original: na dharmo sukhaprekṣikayā pravartate /  apakṣapatito hi dharmaḥ /
na dharmaḥ kālam apekṣya pravartate /  ākāliko hi dharmaḥ /  aihipaśyikaḥ /  pratyātmavedanīyaḥ /
na dharmôdāre pravartate hīneṣu na pravartate /  anunnāmâvanāmo hi dharmaḥ /
na dharmaḥ śuddheṣu pravartate kṣateṣu na pravartate /
utkarṣâpakarṣâpagato hi dharmas tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
na dharmâryeṣu pravartate pṛthagjaneṣu na pravartate /  kṣetradṛṣṭivigato hi dharmaḥ /
na dharmo divā pravartate rātrau na pravartate /  rātryāṃ vā pravartate divā na pravartate /  sadâdhiṣṭhito hi dharmaḥ /
na dharmasyônatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam aprameyâsaṃkhyeyo hi dharmâkāśavan na kṣīyate na vardhate /
na dharmaḥ satvai rakṣyate /  dharmaḥ satvān rakṣati /
na dharmasya kvacit pratighāto /  *apratihatalakṣaṇo hi dharmaḥ /  [ Bendall ed p324 ---> ]
na dharmo 'nuśayaṃ vahati /  niranuśayo hi dharmaḥ /
evaṃ bodhisatvo dharmavad dharme smṛtim upasthāpayati /
katamāni pañca /  śraddhêndriyaṃ vīryêndriyaṃ smṛtîndriyaṃ samādhîndriyaṃ prajñêndriyam iti //
yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmîti /  sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /  bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti /

taccaryāpratipannaś cânyatra  [ Bendall ed p317 ---> ]  yāne spṛhāṃ nôtpādayati /  paramârthanītârthaṃ gambhīrapratītyasamutpādanairātmyaniḥsatvanirjīvaniḥpudgalavyavahāraśūnyatānimittâpraṇihitalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān śrutvā śraddadhāti /
sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nânuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
yān dharmān śraddhêndriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryêndriyeṇa samudānayatîdam ucyate vīryêndriyaṃ //
dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmâhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmêśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo
tgt_original: ཆོས་ལ་གཞོལ་བ་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་ནོར་ཅན་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་ཟས་ཅན་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་སྨན་ཅན་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་གཏེར་ཅན་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་དབང་ཕྱུག་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་བདག་པོ་། ཆོས་ཀྱི་སྦྱིན་བདག་། རྟག་ཏུ་གཏོང་བ་ལ་མངོན་པར་དགྱེས་པ་།

src_original: nityatyāgâbhiratā nityâpramattā nityavivekâbhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā
evaṃ ca tān anusmṛtya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti //
yae ete buddhā bhagavanto 'nantâparyantaguṇâite dharmajā dharmapadā dharmanirmitā dharmâdhipateyā dharmaprabhā dharmagocarā dharmapratiśaraṇā dharmaniṣpannāḥ /
yāny api laukikāni lokôttarāṇi ca sukhāni santi /
tāny api dharma-  [ Cambridge MS f145a ---> ]  jāni dharmaniṣpannāni /
samo hi dharmaḥ samaḥ satveṣu pravartate /  dharmo hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭânapekṣyaḥ pravartate /
